Libraries

JavaScript Libraries

  • GraphQL.jsÂ - A reference implementation of GraphQL for JavaScript.
  • express-graphqlÂ - GraphQL Express Middleware.
  • koa-graphqlÂ - GraphQL Koa Middleware.
  • hapi-graphqlÂ - Create a GraphQL HTTP server with Hapi.
  • codemirror-graphqlÂ - GraphQL mode and helpers for CodeMirror.
  • graphql-schemaÂ - Create GraphQL schemas with a fluent/chainable interface.
  • graphql-sequelizeÂ - Sequelize helpers for GraphQL.
  • graphql-sequelize-crudÂ - Automatically generate queries and mutations from Sequelize models.
  • graffitiÂ - Node.js GraphQL ORM.
  • graffiti-mongooseÂ - Mongoose (MongoDB) adapter for graffiti (Node.js GraphQL ORM).
  • babel-plugin-graphqlÂ - Babel plugin that compile GraphQL tagged template strings.
  • adrenalineÂ - React bindings for Redux with Relay in mind.
  • graphql-bookshelfÂ - Some help defining GraphQL schema around BookshelfJS models.
  • graphql-bookshelfjsÂ - A simple bridge between your graphql queries and your bookshelf models, perform batched and optimised queries.
  • graph.qlÂ - Faster and simpler technique for creating and querying GraphQL schemas.
  • react-reachÂ - A library to communicate with Graphql through Redux
  • LokkaÂ - Simple JavaScript client for GraphQL, which you can use anywhere.
  • StrapiÂ - Open-source Node.js framework that supports "GraphQL" out of the box.
  • GraysQLÂ - A GraphQL manager and loader.
  • graysql-orm-loaderÂ - A GraysQL extension to load a GraphQL schema from an ORM.
  • Annotated GraphQLÂ - Proof of Concept for annotations in GraphQL (i.e.: transform an existing REST api into a GraphQL endpoint).
  • Apollo ClientÂ - A well-documented GraphQL client. Has React and Angular bindings.
  • graphql-toolsÂ - Tool library for building and maintaining GraphQL-JS servers.
  • graphql-anywhereÂ - Run a GraphQL query anywhere, against any data, with no schema.
  • graphql-tagÂ - A JavaScript template literal tag that parses GraphQL queries.
  • modelizrÂ - A library for simplifying the process of writing GraphQL queries, mocking them and normalizing their responses.
  • vue-apolloÂ - Vue integration for apollo.
  • graphql-thinkyÂ - Build an optimized GraphQL schema from Thinky RethinkDB models.
  • graphql-pouchÂ - A GraphQL-API runtime on top of PouchDB created by GraphQL shorthand notation as a self contained service with CouchDB synchronization.
  • gql-toolsÂ - Tool library with CLI for schema generation and manipulation.
  • graphql-iso-dateÂ - A GraphQL date scalar type to be used with GraphQL.js. This scalar represents a date in the ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD.
  • graphql-composeÂ - Tool which allows you to construct flexible graphql schema from different data sources via plugins.
  • node-graphjoinerÂ - Create GraphQL APIs using joins, SQL or otherwise.
  • FetchQLÂ - GraphQL query client with Fetch
  • Join MonsterÂ - A GraphQL-to-SQL query execution layer for batch data fetching.
  • Create-GraphQLÂ - Command-line utility to build production-ready servers with GraphQL.
  • GraphQL-PokÃ©monÂ - Get information of a PokÃ©mon with GraphQL!
  • graphql-factoryÂ - Create GraphQL types from JSON definitions
  • ChromeiQLÂ - Chrome extension to use GraphiQL anywhere
  • graphql-auto-mutationÂ - Automatically generates functions for mutations specified in a GraphQL schema.
  • GraphiteJSÂ - Full stack GraphQL framework.
  • loopback-graphqlÂ - GraphQL Server for Loopback.
  • paraspriteÂ - Describe your GraphQL schema using chainable interface.
  • GraphQL.jsÂ - JavaScript GraphQL Client for Browser and Node.js Usage
  • graphql-syncÂ - Promise-free wrapper to GraphQL.js for synchronous environments
  • apollo-fetchÂ - Lightweight GraphQL client that supports custom fetch functions, middleware, and afterware
  • SpikenailÂ - Node.js framework for building GraphQL API almost without coding.
  • graphql-weaverÂ - A tool to combine, link and transform GraphQL schemas; combine multiple GraphQL servers into one API.
  • graphql-lodashÂ - Data manipulation for GraphQL queries with lodash syntax.
  • apollo-angularÂ - Angular integration for Apollo.

  • apollo-resolversÂ - Expressive and composable resolvers for Apollo Server and graphql-tools.
  • apollo-errorsÂ - Machine-readable custom errors for Apollo Server.

  • altair-express-middlewareÂ - An express middleware for mounting an instance of Altair GraphQL client.
  • graphql-cost-analysisÂ - A Graphql query cost analyzer.
